title: Cross account AMI monitoring automation using Terraform
description: Setup auditing and monitoring for cross account shared Amazon Machine Image(AMI)

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This solution will help customers to create auditing and monitoring solution for cross accounts shared AWS AMI. This will also alert customers when any de-registered AMI is still getting used in any AWS Service. This pattern will help customers to provide insights about AMI usage and reduce any production issue in case any de-registered AMI is referred in customers production account.
